description.en-US: Kai Says is a voice that keeps you on track, on schedule, and ready for the next challenge of your day. ## Kai Says speaks Calendar Notifications: "John, the time is 7:00 pm. Please prepare for the task 'Pay Bills', starting in 30 minutes." "Bob, the time is 6:30 am. 'Read morning news.' starts now." ## Kai Says follows your commands: "Where is a grocery store near me?" "Find a Sushi restaurant." "What is the weather like?" "What time is it?" "What is today's date?" "Show me flights from NYC to Oakland" "Search books for gardening." "New York Times" "Search top 10 best selling books." "Call Fred" (Mobile App Edition Only) "Calculate 1000*3.2" "Define pickle." "Convert 2000 ft to inches." "Search for images of Hawaii." "Send email to Susan are we meeting later?" (Mobile Edition Only) "Show me videos of Madonna." "Shop blu-ray disc players." "Browse auctions for tool cases." "Check movie showtimes." **** Take a Quick Tour of Kai Says at www.kaisays.com/quick-tour **** **** Listen to DEMOs of Kai Says in action at www.kaisays.com/demos **** **** Take Kai Says on the go with our mobile app. Download at www.kaisays.com/downloads **** #### FEATURES:  Find places, food, retail locations and more  Check weather conditions  Dictionary feature  Place phone calls (Mobile App Edition Only)  Access over a dozen news outlets  Search the web for images, flights, books and more  Find your favorite videos  Shop with your voice  Send email (Mobile App Edition Only)  Access your own personal virtual assistant from an Android mobile app, mobile browser or Android tablet.  Coming soon - a Windows desktop application. #### AGENDA MONITOR FEATURE  Speaks Google Calendar event notifications as reminders at times you specify  Speaks and displays your agenda for the day  Real time display of your 'next event'  User selectable phrase for each event reminder  Up to 10 unique notifications per calendar  Ability to specify a notifications before the start of an event as well as before the end of an event  Dashboard to review history of spoken phrases #### What is Kai Says? Kai Says is a digital personal assistant service using artificial intelligence to help you stay informed. Find a restaurant, locate a gas station, check the weather and more... The Kai Says 'Agenda Monitor' module will sync with a Google Calendar account to announce notifications for events by voice. Create custom reminder phrases of your own! Examples of Kai Says in action with the 'Agenda Monitor' module built in: "You have 30 minutes remaining for 'Lunch'" "Please prepare for the task 'Clean Garage'" "Start the task 'Take out trash', now." "You have an appointment 'Dentist" in 15 minutes. You must be at appointment at 1:00pm" or, create your own with the premium Kai Says Pro subscription: "Hey Steve, it's time to 'Clean Garage'. Don't be lazy!" "Remember to 'Take out the trash'" "You have to be at the 'Dentist' in 15 minutes Steve, let's get a move on" Note: Kai Says notifications operate independently of Google Calendar's built in notification features. You can still use Google's notification system without interference. The Kai Says personal assistant service is FREE with advertising. Kai Says PRO is available for more customization options, special features and no advertising for a low monthly fee. The Kai Says personal assistant service is accessible via a web app at my.kaisays.com (Browser Edition), Android smartphones (Mobile Ediiton) and soon - Windows desktop application. No matter how you get to your Kai - Kai is available to assist you any where you are online. The Kai web app and mobile apps provide an intuitive dashboard to submit commands to the Kai Says service and review the responses - both spoken and displayed in a chat style window. Coming in the fall of 2013, Kai Says will be accessible from tablet devices as well as a Windows desktop application. Every where you are online, Kai Says will be there when in need. You may be familiar with other voice assistance tools such as Apple Siri, Vlingo, Evi, Voice Actions, Skyvi, Voice Search, Jeannie, Wolfram Alpha, Iris, Maluuba, AIVC, IBM Watson, EVA Intern, Nuance Dragon Go and other voice control applications. Kai Says takes a very unique approach to voice assistance and user interaction. Download Kai Says today and experience a new dimension in interactive voice technology! ### Need help? Have feedback or a suggestion? Contact us at feedback@kaisays.com
